fields.name: Access
fields.description: The network traffic is allowed or denied.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A description for this rule. Restricted to 140 chars.

fields.name: DestinationAddressPrefix
fields.description: The destination address prefix. CIDR or destination IP range. Asterisk '*' can also be used to match all source IPs. Default tags such as 'VirtualNetwork', 'AzureLoadBalancer' and 'Internet' can also be used.

fields.name: DestinationAddressPrefixes
fields.description: The destination address prefixes. CIDR or destination IP ranges.

fields.name: DestinationApplicationSecurityGroups
fields.description: The application security group specified as destination.

fields.name: DestinationPortRange
fields.description: The destination port or range. Integer or range between 0 and 65535. Asterisk '*' can also be used to match all ports.

fields.name: Direction
fields.description: The direction of the rule. The direction specifies if rule will be evaluated on incoming or outgoing traffic.

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: The priority of the rule. The value can be between 100 and 4096. The priority number must be unique for each rule in the collection. The lower the priority number, the higher the priority of the rule.

fields.name: Protocol
fields.description: Network protocol this rule applies to.

fields.name: SourceAddressPrefix
fields.description: The CIDR or source IP range. Asterisk '*' can also be used to match all source IPs. Default tags such as 'VirtualNetwork', 'AzureLoadBalancer' and 'Internet' can also be used. If this is an ingress rule, specifies where network traffic originates from.

fields.name: SourceAddressPrefixes
fields.description: The CIDR or source IP ranges.

fields.name: SourceApplicationSecurityGroups
fields.description: The application security group specified as source.

fields.name: SourcePortRange
fields.description: The source port or range. Integer or range between 0 and 65535. Asterisk '*' can also be used to match all ports.
